title: Codex CLI Updates 0.78.0 to 0.80.0
description: Between January 6-9, 2026, OpenAI released Codex CLI versions 0.78.0 through 0.80.0 featuring branching threads, new /permissions command, smarter slash-command matching, better app server thread handling, layered config resolution, and UI improvements.

title: Claude Code 2.1 Major Release
description: Released on January 7, 2026, Claude Code 2.1 brings 80+ new features including Skills system enhancements with automatic hot-reload, multi-language support, auto-continuation for token limits, session teleportation, improved terminal rendering, enhanced security with wildcard permissions, and faster startup performance.

community_feedback.quote: The Skills Update That Changes Everything
2026 Is Where It Gets Very Real Because Of Claude Code

title: Continue v1.5.34
description: Released January 9, 2026, introducing shareable agents, code review inbox features, and VS Code-specific fixes.

title: Cursor CLI Agent Modes and Cloud Handoff
description: On January 16, 2026, Cursor released major CLI updates including Agent modes (Plan and Ask modes), cloud handoff for background task processing, and one-click MCP auth. This update brings the editor's most-loved features to the Cursor CLI.

title: GitHub Copilot Model Deprecation Announcement
description: On January 13, 2026, GitHub announced upcoming deprecation of select Copilot models from Claude, Google, and OpenAI as part of their commitment to a fast, high-quality Copilot experience.

title: Windsurf Next Changelog Updates
description: In January 2026, Windsurf released updates including patch fixes, enhanced code block file path display, improved citation and language parsing in code blocks, and GPT-5.1 model support with priority processing for guaranteed low-latency responses.

title: Devin Review Release
description: On January 21, 2026, Cognition released Devin Review, a code review interface that transforms complex GitHub Pull Requests into organized diffs with smart grouping. Additional updates include multi-branch support and side-by-side AI session viewing.

community_feedback.quote: New AI tool released by Cognition to help navigate through 'vibe-coded' lines of code

title: Gemini CLI v0.26.0-preview.0
description: On January 21, 2026, Google released Gemini CLI v0.26.0-preview.0 featuring simplified paste handling, automation improvements, and experimental features. Release notes were also updated on January 13, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: New Gemini CLI Update Is INSANE!

title: GitHub Copilot SDK Technical Preview
description: On January 22, 2026, GitHub released the Copilot SDK in technical preview, making it significantly easier to build AI agents and opening AI agent development to a broader audience.

title: Continue v1.8.0
description: Released January 22, 2026, with tokenizer bug fixes and GH_TOKEN workflow improvements for continue-agents.

title: No January 2026 Updates Found
description: Based on official sources (aider.chat and GitHub releases), the latest documented release is v0.86.0 from August 9, 2025. No January 2026 updates were found.
